00050 #include <avr/io.h>
00051 #include <avr/interrupt.h>
00052 #include <util/delay.h>
00053 #include <math.h>
00054 
00055 #include "motion.h"
00056 #include "whiteline.h"
00057 #include "ir.h"
00058 #include "lcd.h"
00059 #include "buzzer.h"
00060 
00061 
00062 //initialise the ports used for distance measurment ISR
00063 init_dist_measure()
00064 {
00065  DDRE = 0x00;
00066  PORTE = PORTE | 0x30;
00067 }
00068 
00069 //init uart 0 for zegbee
00070 void uart0_init(void)
00071 {
00072 UCSR0B = 0x00; //disable while setting baud rate
00073 UCSR0A = 0x00;
00074 UCSR0C = 0x06;
00075 UBRR0L = 0x47; //set baud rate lo set to 9600
00076 UBRR0H = 0x00; //set baud rate hi
00077 UCSR0B = 0x90; //98
00078 
00079 }
00080 
00081 //Function to initialize ports
00082 void init_devices()
00083 {
00084  cli(); //Clears the global interrupts
00085  motion_pin_config();
00086  port_init();
00087  init_adc();
00088  timer5_init();
00089  init_lcd();
00090  lcd_init();
00091  lcd_set_4bit();
00092 
00093  init_buzzer();
00094  uart0_init();
00095  sei(); //Enables the global interrupts
00096 }
